description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
41726 - Insert a picture based on cell reference (MS Excel 2010)
 
Enhancements
41601 - Shading Style Fill Effect for cells is not working
41687 - Open CSV file with value longer than 32K in a cell
41684 - InsertRow / InsertRows does not copy Table/List Object formulas accordingly
41629 - "Do not compress images in file" setting is changed
41608 - Throw “CellsException” when a file contains MS Graph charts
 
Performance
41664 - Formulas calculation is slow
 
Exceptions
41703 - Exception: "Index was out of range..." when refreshing PivotTable
41666 - Exception: “Index was outside the bounds of the array” while saving to HTML
41705 - Exception: "The custom number format string is too long." while opening the file
41670 - Exception: “Index was outside the bounds of the array”
 
Bugs
41576 - Image Contrast not preserved when rendering image from MS Excel
41748 - Workbook saved as XLSX corrupted
41728 - Month not ordered the same as an XLSX copy in the PDF
41727 - Problem with duplicated column in XLSX to HTML conversion
41719 - Pivot filter text copied to cells below it
41717 - Losing Value correction on PivotTable refresh
41710 - One character becomes a question mark
41677 - Pivot Table’s CalculatedField SUM not working for 10 digits -ve number on Windows XP
41669 - Removing the “CustomUI14.xml” file from the Excel workbook
41668 - IsAutoFormat setting of PivotTable affecting the hidden columns
41663 - MS Excel warning on opening the saved file
41651 - Problem with custom date formatting in XLSX to HTML conversion
41643 - Dates in Pivot Table not formatted correctly
41620 - PivotTable headers are wrong in the converted PDF file
41614 - PDF not showing the filtered items
41604 - Total text of PivotTable is rendered at the bottom
41696 - The very top line of the chart is 'cutoff'
41695 - Chart Legend is in the wrong position
41691 - Chart is moved or resized after re-saving the file
41683 - Converting an XLS file to PDF, the Charts and Images don't update accordingly
41681 - The name of the red line in the chart drops off partially
41680 - Chart get resized when exported as Ole Frame
41632 - Chart Legend can't be aligned center
41745 - Certain Copy/Paste features are broken
41736 - The saved XLT document still has the error if we save the document to streams
41731 - Opening and saving file generates the corrupt file
41729 - Sorting setting is lost after re-saving and refreshing the filters
41713 - Workbook.CalculateFormula gives “#VALUE!” error
41709 - Opening an XLT file by right clicking on it shows error
41706 - Border breaks after inserting row
41689 - Worksheet.Copy method Issue
41672 - Aspose.Cells interfering with original VBA codes in the spreadsheet
41659 - DeleteBlankRows() method deletes image objects
41648 - Range does not extend its area accordingly
41645 - Moving worksheet invalidates Named Ranges
41642 - Problem with Subtotal (Smart Markers)
41635 - File (with Smart Art) saved with Aspose.Cells is not opening with Open XML SDK
41634 - Creates unreadable content in the XLSXM files
41633 - Add-ins formula issue
41624 - Unable to process document through Aspose.Cells
41611 - OpenOffice Document Spreadsheets issue while opening the files
41609 - Shapes getting copied incorrectly when using Worksheet.Cells.CopyRows
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
